common.siteTitle: Escape4SDG – Learn with teamwork and the Sustainable Development Goals.
common.siteDescription: Explore the SDGs with escape-room style activities, MOOCs and certificates.

home.subtitle: Escape-room style activities, MOOCs and certificates to explore the SDGs in a fun, collaborative way.

certificateSection.title: Certify your
certificateSection.description: Earn internationally recognised digital certificates by completing courses successfully. Progress at your own pace with our quiz system.
certificateSection.benefit1Desc: Your certificates meet international standards and recognition.
certificateSection.benefit2Desc: Learn and assess at your own pace with a flexible quiz system.
certificateSection.benefit3Desc: Get a digital certificate for courses you complete successfully.
certificateSection.benefit4Desc: Learn in a safe and trusted learning environment.

courses.title: Courses
courses.subtitle: Learn at your own pace, unlock quizzes, and earn certificates.
courses.sectionSubtitle: Team spirit and SDG-focused MOOC content.
courses.congrats: Congratulations! The next module is now unlocked.
courses.congratsFinal: Congratulations! You completed the course. You earned your certificate.
courses.certificateLockedDesc: Complete all modules successfully to unlock your certificate.
courses.congratsCertificateDesc: You completed the program and earned your certificate.
courses.certificateVerify: This certificate verifies successful completion of all modules in the course.

about.outputsSubtitle: Comprehensive resources designed for teachers and educators.
about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: An innovative methodology for schools with escape-room style activities, STEAM education and sustainable development goals.
about.intro: Escape4SDG offers an innovative methodology that builds a long-term alliance between schools and the edutainment sector, supporting the integration of new technologies and non-formal education approaches into the classroom.
objectives: Create an innovative hub of collaboration between schools and the edutainment sector
Provide STEAM-oriented edutainment resources for teachers to put the methodology into action
Support the continuous professional development of teachers in digital and STEAM-oriented edutainment practices
results: Games and activities applicable in the classroom
about.moocCardDesc: Online training course for teachers and educators
about.escapeCardDesc: SDG-focused escape room activities for the classroom
about.hubCardDesc: Comprehensive resource centre with courses, certificates and classroom activities
about.howItWorksSubtitle: Discover our platform in a few steps.
about.howItWorksStep1Desc: Sign up for free to the MOOC course you're interested in.
about.howItWorksStep2Desc: Work through the modules in order with videos, quizzes and activities.
about.howItWorksStep3Desc: Pass the assessment at the end of each module to unlock the next one.
about.howItWorksStep4Desc: Complete all modules and download your certificate.

projectsList.project1Title: Increasing Education Access in Rural Areas Project
projectsList.project1Description: A comprehensive project aiming to strengthen digital education infrastructure in rural areas and ensure equal opportunities for education.
projectsList.project2Description: A project aiming to reduce environmental impact and increase productivity by training farmers in sustainable agriculture techniques.
projectsList.project3Description: An international project bringing together students from different countries to raise awareness on climate change and develop solution proposals.
projectsList.project4Description: A training programme for teachers that teaches sustainable development goals through escape room activities.
projectsList.project5Description: An international collaboration project that builds climate awareness while developing students' digital skills.

projects.title: Active Projects
projects.subtitle: Innovative projects we run to achieve sustainable development goals.
projects.intro: Escape4SDG builds a long-term alliance between schools and the edutainment sector, offering STEAM-oriented edutainment resources.
objectives: Create an innovative hub of collaboration between schools and the edutainment sector
Provide STEAM-oriented edutainment resources for teachers
Support teachers' professional development in digital and STEAM-oriented edutainment practices
results: Games and activities applicable in the classroom

projects.escapeCardDesc: SDG-focused escape room activities for the classroom
projects.hubCardDesc: Comprehensive resource centre with courses, certificates and classroom activities

partners.title: Partner Organisations
partners.subtitle: Working together towards the Sustainable Development Goals.
partners.intro: ESC4SDG and our MOOC platform collaborate with institutions and projects in education and sustainable development.
partners.introDetail: Together with our partners from schools, universities, NGOs and the edutainment sector, we deliver STEAM education and SDG-focused projects.
partners.partnerGridDesc: Institutions we collaborate with in education and sustainable development

footer.tagline: Team spirit and sustainable development goals. Learn with MOOCs, escape-style activities and certificates.
